column2:
(df10 %>% 
   ggplot(aes(log(liveness + 1), log(acousticness + 1))) +
   geom_point(color = spotify_green) +
   geom_smooth(color = "black") +
   xlab("Liveness") +
   ylab("Acousticness") +
   theme_tufte()
  )  %>% 
  ggMarginal(type = "hist")
`geom_smooth()` using method = 'gam' and formula 'y ~ s(x, bs = "cs")'
